local.title: Kerala Backwaters
local.description: Experience the serene backwaters of Kerala with houseboat stays, tea plantation visits, and authentic local cuisine.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kochi
itinerary.description: Arrive at Kochi airport, check into hotel, and explore Fort Kochi in the evening.

itinerary.title: Kochi to Munnar
itinerary.description: Drive to Munnar, visit tea plantations and enjoy the scenic beauty.

itinerary.title: Munnar Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Munnar's attractions including Eravikulam National Park.

itinerary.title: Munnar to Alleppey
itinerary.description: Travel to Alleppey and board houseboat for overnight stay.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Check out from houseboat and transfer to airport for departure.

local.title: Goa Beach Holiday
local.description: Relax on pristine beaches, enjoy water sports, and experience Goa's vibrant nightlife.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Goa
itinerary.description: Arrive at Goa airport, check into beach resort, relax on the beach.

itinerary.title: North Goa Exploration
itinerary.description: Visit Calangute, Baga beaches, and explore local markets.

itinerary.title: South Goa Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Palolem beach, visit spice plantations, and enjoy sunset cruise.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Free time for shopping and departure transfer to airport.

international.title: Golden Triangle India
international.description: Explore India's most iconic destinations including the Taj Mahal, Red Fort, and Amber Palace.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Delhi
itinerary.description: Arrive at Delhi airport, check into hotel, and evening orientation.

itinerary.title: Delhi Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Red Fort, India Gate, Humayun's Tomb, and local markets.

itinerary.title: Delhi to Agra
itinerary.description: Drive to Agra, visit Taj Mahal at sunset, and explore Agra Fort.

itinerary.title: Agra to Jaipur
itinerary.description: Morning visit to Taj Mahal at sunrise, then drive to Jaipur via Fatehpur Sikri.

itinerary.title: Jaipur Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Amber Palace, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and local bazaars.

itinerary.title: Jaipur to Delhi
itinerary.description: Drive back to Delhi, last-minute shopping, and evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for international departure.

international.title: Swiss Alps Adventure
international.description: Experience the breathtaking Swiss Alps with scenic train rides, mountain adventures, and luxury accommodations.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Zurich
itinerary.description: Arrive at Zurich airport, city tour, and check into hotel.

itinerary.title: Zurich to Lucerne
itinerary.description: Travel to Lucerne, visit Chapel Bridge and enjoy lake cruise.

itinerary.title: Mount Pilatus Excursion
itinerary.description: Cable car ride to Mount Pilatus, panoramic views, and alpine activities.

itinerary.title: Lucerne to Interlaken
itinerary.description: Scenic train journey to Interlaken, check into mountain resort.

itinerary.title: Jungfraujoch - Top of Europe
itinerary.description: Full day excursion to Jungfraujoch, highest railway station in Europe.

itinerary.title: Adventure Activities
itinerary.description: Paragliding, hiking, or skiing (seasonal) in the Bernese Oberland.

itinerary.title: Interlaken to Zermatt
itinerary.description: Travel to Zermatt, Switzerland's most famous ski resort.

itinerary.title: Matterhorn Experience
itinerary.description: Cable car to Matterhorn Glacier Paradise, stunning mountain views.

itinerary.title: Zermatt to Zurich
itinerary.description: Return journey to Zurich, evening at leisure.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for international departure.

international.title: Bali Island Paradise
international.description: Discover the cultural heart of Bali with temple visits, traditional villages, and pristine beaches.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bali
itinerary.description: Arrive at Ngurah Rai airport, transfer to Ubud, check into resort.

itinerary.title: Ubud Cultural Tour
itinerary.description: Visit monkey forest, traditional markets, and Tegallalang rice terraces.

itinerary.title: Temple Hopping
itinerary.description: Visit Tanah Lot, Uluwatu temples, and enjoy Kecak fire dance.

itinerary.title: Move to Seminyak
itinerary.description: Transfer to Seminyak beach resort, afternoon at leisure.

itinerary.title: Beach and Spa Day
itinerary.description: Relax on Seminyak beach, traditional Balinese spa treatment.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Free time for shopping, transfer to airport for departure.
